```python
import re

def sanskrit_prose(sloka):
    # Remove non-ASCII characters
    sloka = re.sub(r'[^\x00-\x7F]+', '', sloka)
    
    # Convert to Sanskrit prose
    lines = sloka.split('\n')
    for i in range(len(lines)):
        lines[i] = re.sub(r'\s+','', lines[i])
        lines[i] = re.sub(r'([^\x00-\x7F])\1+', r'\1\1', lines[i])
        lines[i] = re.sub(r'\([^)]*\)', r'\1', lines[i])
        lines[i] = re.sub(r'\[\d+\]', '', lines[i])
    
    return '\n'.join(lines)
